messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for Smart Share services.
My Smart Share is not working?
What should I do if Smart Share isn't functioning?
How can I fix issues with my Smart Share service?
Call 345 or UAN: 042-111-345-100 or visit any Telenor Sales & Service Centre to get Smart Share activated on your Telenor prepaid subscription.
